A line segment in Euclidean space is bounded.

lemma isBounded_segment {n : } (x x : EuclideanSpace (Fin n)) : Bornology.IsBounded (segment x x) := by have h1 : Bornology.IsBounded ({x} : Set (EuclideanSpace (Fin n))) := Bornology.isBounded_singleton have h2 : Bornology.IsBounded ({x} : Set (EuclideanSpace (Fin n))) := Bornology.isBounded_singleton have h12 : Bornology.IsBounded (({x} : Set (EuclideanSpace (Fin n))) {x}) := h1.union h2 have hpair : Bornology.IsBounded ({x, x} : Set (EuclideanSpace (Fin n))) := by simpa [Set.union_singleton, Set.pair_comm] using h12 have hconv : Bornology.IsBounded (convexHull ({x, x} : Set (EuclideanSpace (Fin n)))) := (isBounded_convexHull (s := ({x, x} : Set (EuclideanSpace (Fin n)))).2 hpair) simpa [convexHull_pair] using hconv

A relative interior point allows a small step in any affine-span direction.
